Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Corynebacterium glutamicum (MIC=0.8 µM), Listonella anguillarum (MIC=6.3 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=12.5 µM).

Literature.Title: Arasin 1, a proline-arginine-rich antimicrobial peptide isolated from the spider crab, Hyas araneus.
